title: Restorative Yoga For Stress Relief | 30 Minute Practice
description:
De-stress with this 30 minute calming yoga routine that includes gentle and simple full body stretches for relaxation. Each pose is held for around 2 minutes to give time for the body and mind to slow down, and to help reduce cortisol levels. 
Bring a pillow and/or block to this session, if you have them. No worries if not. 

Let me know how this practice goes for you in the comment section down below!

Namaste,
Jess

channelDescription:
Welcome to the channel! 

I'm Jessica, a 500-hr certified yoga instructor with a passion for health, wellness and sharing mindful movement. I'm here to support you on your yoga journey and give you the tools to live a more balanced and mindful life, both on and off the mat. 

On this channel you will find a variety of classes with different styles, lengths and levels, along with the occasional vlog or sit-down chat.

If you enjoy practicing with me and want more exclusive yoga classes, meditations + courses then check out my app, Jess Yoga - available worldwide for iOS and Android (link below). 

Thank you for practicing with me, and I’ll see you on the mat! 

For business inquiries/collaborations please email richburg.jessica@gmail.com.

comments:
Got a rough diagnosis. Psychologist recommended Restorative Yoga. This is exactly what I needed.
Thanks Jess
DG

Honestly recommend this to anyone suffering from anxiety. Sometimes all we really need is a self-loving practice like this to relieve us from all the stress and tensions we feel in our body. Thank you so much for this!

Honestly i wasn't having a good day, i was feeling so stressed so sad so angry so bored so tired but still trying to relax and to tell myself everything is gonna be fine. I always come back to this 30 min video bc it helps me to connect with my body and to relax my mind, thank u 🤍
This was one of the most calming yogas I've done for releaving my stress and anxiety, thanks for this. Made me feel so much better and at peace.
For the first time I don’t check the time every minute I actually enjoyed it so much it felt like massaging the body and the brain! It’s like the best thing I can ever do to myself
